//: The taken (or flesh variants) - flesh version of vanilla creatures. This file contains undead variants. Secronom creatures or anything related are immune to flesh infection.The takens has +25% health, +3 bash resistance and +2 adaptive damage (higher melee dice provides 2 bashing damage to its melee attack. If equal, then half for both). Everything else are the same, except the living's conversion into undead. Also, stunts the flesh variant's evolution and can be rid of manipulation if burnt down (but not for living creatures).
description: A corpse devoured by the flesh, with complete manipulation over its mindless thoughts.

//: Killing this monster will split flesh zombie(s), up to 9 of them! (3x3 tile from the location)
description: An enormous outgrowth of flesh with numerous putrid corpses unified in its edges. Dribbling blood seeps from the mouth of the zombies.

Once an athletic human, now a brutal monster. Its facial features are twisted into an expression of pure rage.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Stumbling as it moves, this corpse of an overweight human regards its surroundings with an empty black gaze.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A monstrous overgrowth of ossified tissue has replaced this zombie's rotting skin with an organic armor of dense bone.  Large clumps of black goo seep from its joints as it shambles aimlessly, with sickening crackling sounds filling the air around it.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A hunched human body with its eyes pushed up into its forehead and drooping cheeks, most of its face is occupied by a puckered mouth. Its stomach is swollen and nearly translucent, with a sickly velvet tint.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_light_red>%1$s spews out concentrated glob of blood acid!</color>

description:
This human corpse drags itself along slowly with its arms.  Its legs are damaged beyond repair.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Distorted outgrowths of calcified bone plates cover this zombie's rotten skin.  Joints and cracks around its body ooze with black goo.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This hideous golem of plated bones and misshapen flesh drags its heavy, pointed limbs behind it like an unwanted burden.  Formerly soft and vulnerable, bones grew around its form to protect it - only, they kept growing.  And growing.  And growing.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Still wearing the tattered remnants of improvised armor and weaponry, it is plain to see that this zombie was once a survivor like you.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A distorted and swollen human body.  Its jaws have elongated into a crocodile like snout, dripping with foul smelling saliva.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A zombie like any other, except that its features and skull have been devastated.  It's unclear what caused the damage, but between the scraps of flesh you can see that its face and brain are gone, though its ears are intact.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

The head of this zombie was once obviously destroyed, the gaps in its scraps of face now filling with a peculiar gray goo.  Human ears hang from the sides, enormous and unsettling.  Thin slits at the front suggest it may be able to see.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This creature's head is a hideous gray skull, formed of human bone fragments and some sort of goo.  Jagged teeth are visible as the thing works its jaw and disturbingly human, lidless eyes stare at you from their sockets.  The thing's fleshy ears are four sizes too large and droop under their own weight.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Its entire body bulges with distended muscles and swollen, festering wounds.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A slab of festering muscle the size of a well-toned bodybuilder.  Seems eager to strangle the life from you.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Somehow this brute hides in the dark like some kind of boogeyman.  Very agile for such a large zombie.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

An undead humanoid, its elongated arms drag along the ground as it moves.  It looks to almost have a hunch from the swollen back and shoulder muscles tearing though its skin.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Black hollow eyes survey the surroundings as the zombie stretches and bends in ways that whoever the original body belonged to never could.  The only thing that seems solid, on this flexible black-veined body, is the rows of sharp black teeth.  You get the feeling that the only human thing remaining is the skin, worn as one would wear clothes.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A human body now swollen to the size of six men, with arms as wide as a trash can.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This once-human body is barely recognizable, scrambling about on all fours, its nails and teeth both sharpened into dangerous looking spikes.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

With a crocodile-like snout and rows of protruding teeth, this swimwear-clad zombie lurks in the water.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Once human, its features have tightened, its lips pulled back into an unnatural grin, revealing rows of blackened teeth beneath its large, piercing eyes.  It stands tall and its movements are fluid and tightly controlled.  A feeling of danger permeates the air around it, and the light that falls on it seems somehow harsher and more glaring.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A twisted mockery of the human form, emaciated, with jet black skin and glowing red eyes.  It is somehow painful to look at, awakening fears deep within your psyche, and even the air around it seems more sinister, somehow darker and more dangerous
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

With its joints in odd places and angles, this humanoid creature prowls across the landscape with surprising speed.  Its teeth and arms are sharpened into fine points, and black ooze seeps out from cuts between its muscles
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A thin corpse, its chest is swollen in what appears to be preparation.  A thick black ooze drips from its open mouth.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A shambling undead humanoid, body overgrown with a tangled mass of otherworldly vegetation.  Hunched over and dragging its feet as it moves, the bramble utterly enveloping its upper half twitches and moves with a life of its own, tendrils tipped with a paralytic sting.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A blackened and twisted naked human body, strips of flesh hang from its body, and it emits a constant haze of thick, velvety smoke.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This horrifying little mutated wretch looks to have once been a child, but its massive gaping jaws are now far more suggestive of a predatory beast.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

It was only a child, and little is different about it now aside from the hungry look in its eyes.  You'd be hard pressed to not feel like you were killing an actual child by putting it down.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

What was once a child is now a mutant beast with blackened skin and massive eyes.  This abomination's vile form makes mockery of its human origin.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This heavily mutated child zombie twitches and flails its limbs in painful looking spasms as it runs about.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This swollen, gooey looking mutant child looks bad, even for a zombie.  Maybe that's why it seems to want a hug so badly.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This crouching child-mutant's face is dominated by a pair of huge black eyes and its fingertips end in sharp claws.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Undeath has not been kind to the children of the apocalypse.  This one is little more than a reanimated membrane of skin stretched across tiny brittle bones.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A huge beast covered in visible scarring from what you can only guess was 'research'.  Being near it, you can hear a slight humming, like that of an electrical transformer.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A human body with pale blue flesh, crackling with electrical energy.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This once-human is visible only as a glowing white silhouette that you have to squint to see, cloaked in a crackling field of lightning that pulses like a beating heart.  It walks slowly and deliberately, the thunderstorm surrounding it eagerly jumping to anything conductive within its grasp.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A very pale dead body with the worst case of static hair you have ever seen.  Sometimes, you can see sparks of electricity around it.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Apart from the jet-black eyes, this zombie looks less decomposed and inhuman than most.  Clad in a tattered lab coat, it seems to have a glimmer of awareness - not a human awareness, but something more sinister.  As you watch it, its movements look almost marionette-like.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A rotund human body, bloated beyond belief and layered in rolls of fat.  It emits a horrible odor, and a putrid pink sludge dribbles from its mouth.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This boomer, normally swollen and ready to burst, has strengthened and solidified.  The bile dribbling from its mouth also appears to have changed.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A huge bloated zombie that appears to have fed upon gasoline; fumes and flames escape from its mouth and fuel leaks from its waddling form.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

With its gray skin swollen to near rupture with putrid gas, this cyst covered zombie looks like it could violently burst under the slightest of disturbances.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Once a soldier, it is dressed head to toe in combat gear and carries itself rather steadily for a zombie.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This soldier zombie's skin radiates a sort of shadowy smoke that obscures its outline, making its camouflage even harder to see against the background.  In the darkness it would be nigh invisible.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Fragments of visible uniform hint that this monstrosity was once a soldier.  Anything human is invisible, hidden inside a sheath of living shadow.  It moves with preternatural fluidity and grace.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This staggering soldier wears a burnt gasmask, now fused to its face.  Through the melted, bile-encrusted ruination of the mask comes some sort of hardened fleshy proboscis, with steaming corrosive fluid leaking from the end.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

special_attacks.description: The acid-sniper zombie launches a corrosive dart!

description:
This zombie wears what appears to have once been a soldier's uniform and armor, now a series of cracked and melted plates that have fused to its skin and thickened hide.  Its face and arms blister with strange mutated tubes that pulse and drip with acid.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

special_attacks.description: The acid-support zombie launches a hail of corrosive darts!

description:
This zombie was once wearing some kind of uniform with heavy, bulletproof materials sewn in.  At this point it's impossible to tell what kind of uniform it was: the monster's skin has grown over the fabric, splitting and tearing it to shreds, turning the remaining Kevlar and other bits of armor material into part of its hide.  Its hands, similarly, have fused into large leathery cudgels.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This zombie was once wearing some kind of now long-shredded uniform with heavy, bulletproof materials sewn in.  It has grown into a hulking, leatherbacked beast, its mutated skin taking on a strange texture similar to the Kevlar bits embedded in it.  Its arms have twisted into enormous clubs of misshapen bone that it drags on the ground behind it.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Once a pilot, it is dressed in basic military fatigues, aviator sunglasses, and a sturdy looking helmet.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This armored and augmented soldier's bionics crackle with energy.  Worse, it appears to remember its training.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This zombie once was a survivor like you, and a pretty good one at that.  Unfortunately they didn't make it, despite the custom-made, heavy armor pieces they wear and the gear that they are still lugging around.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A sickly-looking dead one.  Its skin looks especially thin, with a sticky, yellow fluid flowing through the clearly visible veins.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This body has swollen to immense proportions, but still manages to hold itself together with semi-congealed acid all over its bloated body.  It clumsily moves around, but attacks with a large reserve of acid.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

special_attacks.description: The corrosive zombie spits a glob of blood acid!

description:
A degenerate corpse, shambling as it walks.  Several junks and waste materials have unified into its skin and wounds around it reeks in black goo.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

The deformed, animated corpse of a canine, a sinewy beast which can easily outpace its two-legged friends.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This once-canine has shed all of its skin, revealing a carapace of fused bones and ribs.  Devoid entirely of flesh, this walking suit of bone seems to be controlled by a net of veins and sinews which pulse with glistening black goo.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A zombified version of one of the German shepherd dogs used in law enforcement.  Its deformed body is encased in a protective Kevlar harness.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

Acrid smell accompanies this corpse of canine.  Its whole body is covered in chains of pulsing cysts and slime-dribbling ulcers.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A zombified wolf.  Its mouth oozes with a black substance, coating the vicious-looking white fangs.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This black bear's eyes ooze with dark, oily fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred.  It shuffles as it walks.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

A zombified omnivore descended from the wild boar.  Now it's got black goo all over it, instead of mud.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This wall-eyed beast has a large wound on its side, and ribs with some flesh on them are seen through it.  The most prominent feature of this abomination is large incisors in its ominously open mouth, strange black goo is oozing out of it.  Seems like it isn't interested in trees anymore and is looking for some warm flesh to feed.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

This formerly-majestic moose has succumbed to the infection which is killing the world.  Shiny green blowflies swarm the vast suppurated patches of purulent flesh where its skin has sloughed away, and its remaining fur is black and matted with necrotic discharge.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.

An otherwise normal-looking cougar, except that its hind legs are swollen, and its eyes bulge with black goo.
Membranous veins cover most of its surface that pulsates in constant beats.
